name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gujarati Inscript keyboard for Chrome OS

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It is use to enable Inscript gujarati input keyboard in Chrome OS. Using this extension you can type in gujarati language in google doc as well as in writer odt file in chrome OS.
